item.title: GTES
item.description: score:112 Chances: Gates Industrial Corp plc is showing positive improvement in its Relative Strength (RS) Rating, indicating improving technical performance. The company is expanding into the fast-growing and evolving data center cooling market with its collaboration with CoolIT Systems. Key insiders, including the CEO and a director, have recently increased their stake in the company by purchasing additional shares.

item.title: AUR
